APIFY_TOKEN.title: APIFY_TOKEN
APIFY_TOKEN.description: Token of your Apify account to access datasets

APIFY_USERNAME.title: APIFY_USERNAME
APIFY_USERNAME.description: Your APIFY_USERNAME (customary_dairy, elegant_ostrich, etc.) which can be found in your account profile. Used to access your own datasets

DATASET_NAME.title: DATASET_NAME
DATASET_NAME.description: Name of your dataset can be a random ID as show on the dataset page or a named dataset (which has a name you set)

DOWNLOAD_LIMIT.title: DOWNLOAD_LIMIT
DOWNLOAD_LIMIT.description: Limit of items to download from dataset
